meanings.definition: Vulcanite: a hard black or brown rubber-like substance made by vulcanizing rubber with sulfur.
meanings.sent1: The dentist used vulcanite to create a durable dental mold.
meanings.sent2: The old-fashioned buttons on her coat were made of vulcanite.
meanings.sent3: When the rubber band ran away, the vulcanite ruler had to take charge.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt as tough as vulcanite after enduring the hardships.
meanings.sent5: The smell of vulcanite in the factory was overpowering.

meanings.definition: Vulcanite: an object made of vulcanized rubber.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop displayed a collection of vulcanite jewelry.
meanings.sent2: The vulcanite handle of the umbrella was sturdy and reliable.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted around the vulcanite bracelet like a toy.
meanings.sent4: His words were as unyielding as a piece of vulcanite.
meanings.sent5: The vulcanite figurine gleamed under the bright lights of the exhibit.
